mapper.sql: TASK_TRANSFER_ID, TASK_DETAIL_ID, TRANSFER_STATUS, ROPERATE_PERSON_ID, ROPERATE_DEPT_ID, CALL_MEMO, CALL_RESULT, TRANSFE_ROPERATE, TRANSFER_TIME, CDR_ID, BACK_MEMO, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_DEPT,domain_id
mapper.insert: insert into OC_TASK_TRANSFER (TASK_TRANSFER_ID, TASK_DETAIL_ID, TRANSFER_STATUS, ROPERATE_PERSON_ID, ROPERATE_DEPT_ID, CALL_MEMO, CALL_RESULT, TRANSFE_ROPERATE, TRANSFER_TIME, CDR_ID, BACK_MEMO, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_DEPT,domain_id) values (#{taskTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roperatePersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roperateDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfeRoperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cdrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

TASK_TRANSFER_ID,

mapper.update:
update OC_TASK_TRANSFER
TASK_DETAIL_ID = #{taskDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_STATUS = #{transferStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROPERATE_PERSON_ID = #{roperatePersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROPERATE_DEPT_ID = #{roperateDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALL_MEMO = #{callMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALL_RESULT = #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFE_ROPERATE = #{transfeRoperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_TIME = #{transferTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CDR_ID = #{cdrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_MEMO = #{backMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_DEPT = #{operatorDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TASK_TRANSFER_ID = #{taskTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update OC_TASK_TRANSFER set TASK_DETAIL_ID = #{taskDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFER_STATUS = #{transferStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROPERATE_PERSON_ID = #{roperatePersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROPERATE_DEPT_ID = #{roperateDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALL_MEMO = #{callMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALL_RESULT = #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFE_ROPERATE = #{transfeRoperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFER_TIME = #{transferTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CDR_ID = #{cdrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_MEMO = #{backMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_DEPT = #{operatorDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TASK_TRANSFER_ID = #{taskTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update OC_TASK_TRANSFER
TRANSFER_STATUS = #{transferStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALL_MEMO = #{callMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALL_RESULT = #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_TIME = #{transferTime},
where TASK_DETAIL_ID = #{taskDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into OC_TASK_TRANSFER (TASK_TRANSFER_ID, TASK_DETAIL_ID, TRANSFER_STATUS, ROPERATE_PERSON_ID, ROPERATE_DEPT_ID, CALL_MEMO, CALL_RESULT, TRANSFE_ROPERATE, TRANSFER_TIME, CDR_ID, BACK_MEMO, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_DEPT,domain_id) values
(#{record.taskTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.taskDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.transferStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.roperatePersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.roperateDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.callMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.transfeRoperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.transferTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.cdrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.backMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.operatorDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{record.domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select t.TASK_TRANSFER_ID TASK_TRANSFER_ID, t.TASK_DETAIL_ID TASK_DETAIL_ID, t.TRANSFER_STATUS TRANSFER_STATUS, t.ROPERATE_PERSON_ID ROPERATE_PERSON_ID, t.ROPERATE_DEPT_ID ROPERATE_DEPT_ID, t.CALL_MEMO CALL_MEMO, t.CALL_RESULT CALL_RESULT, t.TRANSFE_ROPERATE TRANSFE_ROPERATE, t.TRANSFER_TIME TRANSFER_TIME, t.CDR_ID CDR_ID, t.BACK_MEMO BACK_MEMO, t.OPERATOR_ID OPERATOR_ID, t.OPERATOR_DEPT OPERATOR_DEPT, c.destination_number destination_number, c.total_time total_time, c.call_time call_time, c.created_time created_time, c.answered_time answered_time, c.hangup_time hangup_time, c.recordid1 recordid1, c.recordid2 recordid2, c.qc qc, c.hangup_cause hangup_cause, p1.dept_name RECEIVE_DEPT_NAME from OC_TASK_TRANSFER t left join pbx_cdrs c on t.CDR_ID = c.cdr_id left join OC_TASK_DETAIL d on d.TASK_DETAIL_ID = t.TASK_DETAIL_ID left join ucc_depts p1 on d.DEPT_MESH_ID = p1.dept_id where t.TASK_DETAIL_ID = #{taskDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.TASK_DETAIL_ID, t.TRANSFER_TIME DESC

select t.TASK_TRANSFER_ID TASK_TRANSFER_ID, t.TASK_DETAIL_ID TASK_DETAIL_ID, t.TRANSFER_STATUS TRANSFER_STATUS, t.ROPERATE_PERSON_ID ROPERATE_PERSON_ID, t.ROPERATE_DEPT_ID ROPERATE_DEPT_ID, t.CALL_MEMO CALL_MEMO, t.CALL_RESULT CALL_RESULT, t.TRANSFE_ROPERATE TRANSFE_ROPERATE, t.TRANSFER_TIME TRANSFER_TIME, t.CDR_ID CDR_ID, t.BACK_MEMO BACK_MEMO, t.OPERATOR_ID OPERATOR_ID, t.OPERATOR_DEPT OPERATOR_DEPT, c.destination_number destination_number, c.call_time call_time, d.TASK_CODE TASK_CODE, p1.dept_name RECEIVE_DEPT_NAME from OC_TASK_TRANSFER t left join pbx_cdrs c on t.CDR_ID = c.cdr_id left join OC_TASK_DETAIL d on t.TASK_DETAIL_ID = d.TASK_DETAIL_ID left join ucc_depts p1 on t.ROPERATE_DEPT_ID = p1.dept_id where t.TASK_DETAIL_ID in ( ${taskDetailIds} ) and t.CDR_ID is not null order by t.TASK_DETAIL_ID, t.TRANSFER_TIME DESC
